boardgame.name: Dobbel zo Clever
Doppelt so clever
Twice As Clever
Vraiment très futé
boardgame.description: Doppelt so clever follows the model of 2018's Ganz sch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ouml;n clever. Each turn the active player rolls six dice, chooses one of them to mark off a space on their scoring grid, places any dice with lower numbers on the side, then re-rolls any remaining dice. The white die is a joker and can be used as any one of the other five colors. After the active player chooses at most three dice, then the other players chooses one of the set-aside dice for use on their scoring sheet._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Doppelt so clever has five new dice-marking challenges and a new action beyond the re-roll and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;use one more die_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; actions of the earlier game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
